website_summaries.verdict: An excellent handmade piece that's perfect for displaying your favorite blooms or giving as a gift for the flower-lover in your life.
pros: A handmade vase that's crafted in ceramic, and sports porcelain flowers on the exterior
Choice of 2 styles measuring 10.6 or 11.6 inches
Ready to give as a gift, as it comes in attractive packaging
cons: Colors may look slightly different in person than on your monitor
The downside of the decorative flowers is that they are delicate and may break or chip

website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful ceramic flower vase that's handmade by artists. An elegant gift or treat for yourself.
pros: Anyone would be proud to showcase this attractive, handmade vase that is adorned with porcelain flowers and gold accents that complement bouquets
Available in 2 styles that vary slightly in height, 11.6 inches or 10.6 inches
cons: The porcelain flowers have delicate petals that are prone to breaking off if not handled with care
Colors may look different in person

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vase
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase. Very unique. The cut out around the top, the painted rose & the musical symbol make this great! I was surprised at how much I love it! And a great price. Could be displayed with or without flowers. I know my friend will love it too. Packed so securely it will not break from shipping. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Three Vases - 3 Different Family Members
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell my family....three different family member presents over time for different occasions!! Beautiful with flowers I picked out to match!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: Cost to quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to hold medium stem flowers and keel them upright! Adds beauty to a table for a centerpiece of fresh cut flowers. My mother loves it. Steady and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ethbin Hayes

customer_reviews.title: You had one job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vase, but do not be fooled by the photos. This vase WILL NOT HOLD A BOUQUET OF FLOWERS. It is not a single, large reservoir, as you would clearly see if the photos were not taken against a white backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E Stroup

customer_reviews.title: This vase is so beautiful and cute
customer_reviews.text: This vase is so beautiful and cute! I gifted it to my professor as a parting gift. I liked it so much that I ordered it again for gifting it to my office manager this time. :) The packaging was also done properly such that the product would not be damaged in the transit. I highly recommend this vase!
customer_reviews.author: Sayali

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! When you buy something online, you never know what's exactly going to show up. But wow, this came to me looking better than I could have expected. It was an amazing Mother's Day figt to my mom. <3 Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: The case looks so beautiful. It’s a 3D case and looks really expensive. Everybody is asking me where I found it because of the unique look.
customer_reviews.author: Anja Georgiou

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: The vase was pretty but not very sturdy. I put some flowers in it and it tipped over on my table and broke. Disappointed since I only had it for a week. Update: The customer service was great! They contacted me and apologized for what happened. I updated my rating due to the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Owens

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and it actually holds a lot more flowers than I hought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this vase
customer_reviews.text: I spent a couple of day looking for the perfect vase in amazon. Most of them were too small or too expensive. But then I found this one, the materials are excellent the details are amazing. Overall an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Unique Design!  I'm ordering 2 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this vase -- the design, the glaze, the colors, and especially the unique shape. Even without flowers in it, it's a work of art. I've ordered and received two of these, using each one for an arrangement of small artificial succulents. Now I'm about to order two more to use in creating gifts for friends. I hope HakkaGirl creates more pieces with the qualities of this one.
customer_reviews.author: SandraJ

customer_reviews.title: This is even more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: This is even more beautiful in person! I have it displayed in my living room and I think I will make it last a long time in my family!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful vase! My step mom loves it! Thanks for fast delivery! It sure will be a nice addition to her collection. And I love the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: N. petersen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: A big, beautiful vase. I am going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved the entire gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a gift for my fiance. She loved the entire gift, but thought the vase was exceptionally cute. Understand that it's a small vase, but generally high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Slack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.text: The pic doesn't do it justice. It is very pretty in person!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is quality, big and beautiful! I like it so much
customer_reviews.author: Zulfarina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The vase is beautiful. And it got here very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: Great ! Bought it for my mom, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY P.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vase for the price. Doesn't break easy (trust me I dropped it). Pretty happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Vase is Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the vase, it is nice quality and beautiful. I ordered it for a gift and I can't wait to give it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple looking vase so as to not take away the beauty of the flowers. This was the perfect height, shape and width that i was looking for. I wanted a vase to hold about 3 big flowers so it’s easy to maintain and replace every week. The bow didn’t come tied to the vase but I just tied it the way that I wanted it to look like and I think it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie_Explorer415

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this vase
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vase! The colors and the unique shape are exactly as viewed in the photos, but it even more beautiful than I had hoped. I ordered a few vases recent to this purchase and while I enjoy all of them, the two I ordered from HakkaGirl Crafts were the very best of them all. The packaging was protective and the vases were immediately ready for display upon their prompt delivery. The size, shape and colors are perfect to display in any room. This vase is small & used only for display.
customer_reviews.author: Rozanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, the pictures they show; doesn't do it justice. And it looks alot bigger then what I was expecting which is a good thing in my opinion. I love everything about it, it's a very interesting with how the shape is a oval body.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It IS smaller than I'd expected, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had ZERO reason to assume it was big. The picture means nothing since there's no ruler beside it. AND the text says exactly how tall it is. I initially didn't think I'd use it, but it's become my favorite vase. I have two rose bushes, and this being Arizona, they constantly bloom. The new roses go into this vase, decorating my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: BigSmiler

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful in real life just like the picture. I like how at the bottom has the non slip things so it doesn't fall easily and it doesn't make a big noise if out in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and delicate vase.
customer_reviews.text: My vase just arrived. It's an exquisite ceramic piece of art. My only complaint is that the yellow flowers look pale, not the same color I saw in the online picture.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Customer service was very good.
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service was great! They resolved the problem. The vase itself is very pretty, but one of the flower's petals was broken. The broken piece was not in the box, so it was shipped that way. Disappointing. It was a gift for my boss. The yellow in the flower is not as bright as the picture, but it was still very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Nard-Lennartson

customer_reviews.title: Beyond beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! I will be buying more as I love having a lot of plants
customer_reviews.author: Erin McgregorTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Extremely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Georgous! I got the vase with the music roses. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: mrko

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Vase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, ordered for her for Mothers Day, she loves me now
customer_reviews.author: JCA

customer_reviews.title: Vase
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but not the color I wanted. Will probably give it a gift to someone for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This little vase is perfect for all the small flowers that are starting in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase so much!! It's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than pictures .i want to buy other one.
customer_reviews.author: jamila

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors but smaller in size than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: Tall White Ceramic Flower Vases,11.6’’ High Decorative Vases with Handmade Porcelain Yellow Flowers for Living Room, Kitchen, Table, Home, Office, Centerpiece, Wedding, Party or as a Gift
feature_bullets: EYE-CATCHING UNIQUE&STYLISH SHAPE:This high white ceramic vases is hand-made by skilled craftmans. Hand carved porcelain yellow flowes with “gold” line make decorative table vases elegant and stand out wherever you add to.

WATER-TIGHT&FLAT BOTTOM: Made from high quality ceramic, the flower vase’s bottom is flat and water-tight, which make the vases not only avoid damaging table but allows you to fill these white vases with your favorite fresh or artificial flowers, like Roses, Tulips, Orchids or branches, wheat and etc.

MATCH ANY DECORS&BEST GIFT: Perfect size 11.8H*5.9L*3.5W inches compliment most of office or home décor, living room, table, Kitchen, shelf, dinner parties, housewarming, holidays, wedding, rastaurant, flower shop, spa and other special occasions. Also as a best gift to your family, friends or lovers who likes to decor accents around the house.
PROFESSIONAL&REINFORCED PACKAGING: This white ceramic flower vases are packaged with reinforced foam padding in a box to make sure ceramic vases come in good conditions.
ONLINE ALL DAY: Please trust us, no matter what problem you encountered, we will try our best to serve you and meet your requirements.
